description_en: A core exercise focusing on the rectus abdominis (upper).
description_ar: تمرين core يركز على rectus abdominis (upper).
instructions_en: Lie on back, knees bent, feet flat
Hands behind head (don't pull on neck!)
Curl shoulders off floor, lifting chest toward ceiling
Focus on RIBS moving toward PELVIS
Lower with control, don't rest head on floor
tips_en: Pulling on neck → Fingertips behind ears only
Full sit-up → Only lift shoulders 30 degrees

description_en: A core exercise focusing on the rectus abdominis, obliques.
description_ar: تمرين core يركز على rectus abdominis, obliques.
instructions_en: Lie on back, hands behind head
Lift shoulders and feet off floor

description_en: A core exercise focusing on the rectus abdominis.
description_ar: تمرين core يركز على rectus abdominis.
instructions_en: Kneel facing cable, rope behind head
Curl torso down, bringing elbows toward knees
Control return, don't let weight pull you up

description_en: A core exercise focusing on the rectus abdominis (lower).
description_ar: تمرين core يركز على rectus abdominis (lower).
instructions_en: Lie on back, knees bent 90 degrees
Curl pelvis up toward ribs (lift hips off floor)
Focus on PELVIS to RIBS, not legs to chest
tips_en: Only moving legs → Lift the pelvis!
Swinging → Keep movement small and focused

description_en: A core exercise focusing on the rectus abdominis, hip flexors.
description_ar: تمرين core يركز على rectus abdominis, hip flexors.
instructions_en: Lie on back, knees bent, feet anchored or free
Cross arms on chest or behind head
Sit up fully, bringing torso to thighs

instructions_en: Lie flat, hands under hips for support
Keep lower back pressed into floor
Lower slowly, don't let back arch

Don't let hips sag or pike up

description_en: A core exercise focusing on the rectus abdominis.
description_ar: تمرين core يركز على rectus abdominis.
instructions_en: Roll out slowly, keeping abs tight
Go as far as you can control
Pull back using abs, not hip flexors
tips_en: Arching lower back → Stop before this happens
Using arms to pull back → Abs do the work
Going too far → Build up gradually

description_en: A core exercise focusing on the rectus abdominis, core stability.
description_ar: تمرين core يركز على rectus abdominis, core stability.
instructions_en: Lie on back, arms toward ceiling, knees at 90 degrees
Press lower back into floor (maintain throughout)
Lower opposite arm and leg simultaneously
Excellent for core stability without back strain

description_en: A core exercise focusing on the rectus abdominis.
description_ar: تمرين core يركز على rectus abdominis.
instructions_en: Lie on back, arms overhead, legs straight
Lift arms, head, shoulders, and legs off floor
Hold position (body looks like a banana)
Scale by bending knees or tucking arms

description_en: A core exercise focusing on the rectus abdominis.
description_ar: تمرين core يركز على rectus abdominis.
instructions_en: Lie on bench, grip bench behind head
Raise legs and torso until vertical
Lower body as one unit (like a flag)
Keep body straight - don't bend at hips
Go only as low as you can maintain form
